name: 曾柏軒　Office Hours
objective: 本課程基於計算網路的基礎，講授近代網路技術包含 Software Defined Networking, Network Functions Virtualization, Quality of Experience, Internet of Things, and Cloud Computing and Networking，並規劃軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的實習課程，利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及虛擬交換器，透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解虛擬化技術對於無線網路的影響。
schedule:
課程主題：
1. Introduction of OpenFlow 2 weeks
2. Data Plane 2 weeks
3. Control Plane 2 weeks
4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV) 2 weeks
5. Quality of Experience 1 week
6. Internet of Things, and Cloud Computing and Networking 1 week
7. Network Security 
實驗主題：
1. OpenFlow and Mininet Controller
2. RYU Controller
3. SDN with WiFi
scorePolicy: 實驗 35% (實驗成果 30%、GitLab 社群參與程度 5%)、期末專題 30%、期末考 35%
materials:
Foundations of Modern Networking: SDN, NFV, QoE, IoT, and Cloud, by WILLIAM STALLINGS 

課程網頁: http://www.cc.ntut.edu.tw/~phtseng/course.html
